dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 638 IH: National Wildlife Refuge Review Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Fleming (for himself, Mr. Simpson, Mr. Young of Alaska, Mr. Jones, Mr. Franks of Arizona, Mr. Gohmert, Mr. McClintock, Mr. Posey, Mr. Thompson of Pennsylvania, Mr. Amodei, Mrs. Blackburn, and Mr. Southerland) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the National Wildlife Refuge System Administration Act of 1966 to require that any new national wildlife refuge may not be established except as expressly authorized by statute.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Wildlife Refuge Review Act of 2013.

section.header: Prohibition on establishment of new national wildlife refuges

subsection.text: Section 4(a) of the National Wildlife Refuge System Administration Act of 1966 (16 U.S.C. 668dd(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: The Secretary may not establish any national wildlife refuge except as expressly authorized by a law enacted after January 3, 2013.

subsection.text: The amendment made by subsection (a) shall not apply with respect to any national wildlife refuge established on or before January 3, 2013.
